channel.title: [Delta] How do I make an item stackable?
channel.description:
Well, I'm using delta, and I want to make reward tokens stackable so I can use them as a new type of currency. But, no clue how to do that, and I don't even know what file to look at. :\
EDIT: got it. sorry for the post. :\
